name: (Not) Random Dice Game
description:
A simple yet challenging puzzle game about rolling dice onto buttons. All dice move at the same time so be careful!

Submission for GMTK Game Jam 2022

The game contains no randomness and every level has been playtested and is possible

m6x11 font by Daniel Linssen https://managore.itch.io/m6x11

sound effects by Nathan Gibson https://ellr.itch.io/universal-ui-soundpack

Enjoy!
